ground_truth: We have that $\angle P = (\text{arc } BD - \text{arc } AC)/2$ and $\angle Q = (\text{arc } AC)/2$.  Hence, $\angle P + \angle Q = (\text{arc } BD)/2 = (42^\circ + 38^\circ)/2 = \boxed{40^\circ}$.
